alert.note: Alert for East Central Plains; North Central Mountains; Northeast Highlands; Northeast Plains; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; Sandia Manzano And Gallinas Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 18 at 7:59PM MDT until May 19 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING THURSDAY AFTERNOON AND EARLY EVENING FOR ALL ZONES EXCEPT THE MIDDLE RIO GRANDE VALLEY AND WEST CENTRAL HIGHLANDS DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, NEAR-RECORD HEAT, AND AN UNSTABLE AIRMASS... ...RED FLAG WARNING FRIDAY FROM LATE MORNING UNTIL MID EVENING FOR ALL AREAS DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, NEAR-RECORD HEAT, AND AN UNSTABLE AIRMASS... .Strong west to southwest winds with single digit humidity, near record hot temperatures, and an unstable airmass will generate widespread critical fire weather conditions mainly over northern and eastern areas Thursday, then areawide Friday when winds will be the strongest. Poor to fair overnight humidity recoveries are expected Thursday night, when breezy to windy conditions will persist keeping critical conditions going even past midnight in some locations. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT THURSDAY... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 9 PM MDT FRIDAY... * AREA AND TIMING...Northwest Plateau and Highlands, North Central Mountains, Northeast Highlands and Plains, Sandia/Manzano and Gallinas Mountains, and the East Central Plains Thursday and Friday mainly during the afternoon and early evening. * 20 FOOT WINDS...West-southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 40 mph Thursday and west 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 45 mph Friday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...4 to 8 percent Thursday. 6 to 12 percent Friday. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.

area.areaDesc: East Central Plains; North Central Mountains; Northeast Highlands; Northeast Plains; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; Sandia Manzano And Gallinas Mountains
